website_summaries.verdict: Great backyard volleyball set, as it can be installed quickly and the entire set fits in a carrying bag.
pros: Ships with everything you need to start playing backyard volleyball right away, including a volleyball
Net is easy to set up
More durable than some other models
Carrying case is made of durable materials, so it'll last
Net and frame also work for games like badminton
cons: Occasional problems with shipping quality, as some customers report parts missing

customer_reviews.title: This set is the best investment I've made in recent purchases
customer_reviews.text: This set is the best investment I've made in recent purchases. My niece's absolutely love it. Very sturdy and conveniently packaged. The travel case is perfect for storage and portability. The perimeter line can be tricky to store. I found it helpful to make sure that the perimeter tape is rolled carefully from short corner to short corner and held together w/ rubber bands. After the two bundles are banded, proceed carefully long ways in the same manner then band that together w/ rubber bands as well. A bit tedious, I know, but trust me, worthwhile!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but only one height setting
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty nice net, but FYI, it is NOT co-ed/men's height. Unless I missed it somehow, the poles only have one height setting, which is closer to a women's-height net. So we still get a lot of use out of it, but unfortunately can't use it for co-ed or men's games. But it is good quality and I like that the boundary lines are flat straps instead of the standard rope. The ball that comes with it is crap, but it works as a warmup ball.
customer_reviews.author: Slats

customer_reviews.title: 10 minutes to setup
customer_reviews.text: It only took us 10 minutes from the time we opened the box to our first serve! The kids love playing volleyball, and I'll enjoy how easy it will be to put away and back up again whenever I need to cut the yard. Well worth the money. Very well built. The little rope pullers are a nice touch to get the stakes out of the ground too!
customer_reviews.author: Bluff Gardener

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Recommend The Warehouse Deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set from Amazon Warehouse deals for a nice discount. The set was a complete disaster. The bag literally had sand in and all of the pieces were loose. The rope that holds the net up between the posts was damaged and not attached correctly. It was basically unusable. Someone had purchased this, used it and returned it. Apparently Amazon doesn't do any kind of cleaning or refurbishing on returned items. If the set had been new, I'm sure I would've like it. All of the components were good quality, they were just abused in my case.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: A great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific set that's replacing an existing, very cheap and flimsy set. The bars are very sturdy, and were easily able to stand on their own with the help of the stakes. The only improvement I can think of would be sharpened stakes, so that they're easier to drive into the ground with one's hand. We had to get a tool to drive them since they're flat-edged. But, it's not a big deal. 5-stars, easily!
customer_reviews.author: Romell Parks-Weekly

customer_reviews.title: Just one tiny flaw but overall great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: food height for a decent game. Easy to assemble. Official size boundary lines. Cons: the top of the mesh net comes with draw strings to determine how tight you want the net. Well if you're not careful like a hoodie draw string if you pull too much on one end well guess what ? It's going to go in and it's a pain to get it back out. So make sure to put a big knot at the end of the string to avoid getting one end in. I unfortunately had to make a slit and maneuvered it through. My fingers were cramping when done. Other than that it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought for kids in junior high and high school - could not believe how sturdy and easy this was to assemble. Can't go wrong with this set if you want a regulation size net. We had this set up in like 10 minutes. All materials are high quality and the metal poles are thick. We were replacing an older volleyball net that had plastic poles (which broke) and the difference with this set and that set is significant. If you are looking at a set with plastic poles, don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Wow - far better set than I'd expected just for backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: Wow - far better set than I'd expected just for backyard fun. The poles are two sections so I can set it low to play volleyball and badminton with my five-year-old great-grandson, but regulation height for adult parties. The ball is solid and appears to be regulation, the net good quality that should hold up well, and the carry bag is convenient. A surprise was fabric ribbons to use to define the "court" on a lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sensel

customer_reviews.title: pretty disappointed for her and me tonight
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the net from sagging, which i think i could have fixed. However, tonight after setting it up the top pole bent and both sides fell down, then the middle pole of the other side was loose. All this within 10 minutes of setting up. I researched a lot for this for my daughter, pretty disappointed for her and me tonight. I am sure we just got a bad set since my research says it's a good product, but tonight's pretty tough. That said, be very careful with these poles and be sure they are sturdy when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Game On!
customer_reviews.text: The feedback for this set seemed to be more consistent, versus mixed reviews on the other brands. Nothing missing - high quality net, poles assemble easily, spool for boundary line is a nice touch, ball inflated properly with included pump (don't forget to wet the needle before you insert it). Hi-visibility yellow color can be easily seen, especially at dusk. Sets up easily, and it all fits back in the sturdy bag.
customer_reviews.author: DrewS

customer_reviews.title: Bad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this volleyball net so my 14 year old daughter could practice volleyball in the backyard. The poles were not made to stand up in the grass and I couldn’t get the Baden company to respond to my emails to see if they sold a different type of net that would work in the yard. I am very disappointed in their customer service and I will not be purchasing their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Filla

customer_reviews.title: Happy Volleying Going On Here!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters (12, 10, 7) and my husband and I have really enjoyed having this volleyball net up in the backyard during our quarantined time at home (COVID19). It's regulation size and comes a perimeter line to help you mark off the boundaries! It was very easy to put together and seems very sturdy! It came with a nice ball and air pump, as well. :) No qualms about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters both play volleyball for school teams. We purchased this for home play and it is a wonderful net! So easy to set up and takes very little time. Take down is just as easy. Kids are 15 and 13 and can do it on their own in less than 10 minutes. Also comes with a court layout that is easy and fun to use. The ball that comes with it is soft and sturdy. Comes with a great carrying case as well to take with you anywhere. We also use the net for badminton fun. Great purchase all around.
customer_reviews.author: bakergirl28

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball net!
customer_reviews.text: Great volleyball net, exactly what I was hoping for! High quality, easy to assemble. Hoping to enjoy this for years to come! The ball is comfortable to bump/set/hit, extra bonus :)
customer_reviews.author: nemesioucr

customer_reviews.title: This is the only volleyball net system you will ever need!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I’m very impressed with the quality of the entire set that includes the ball as well. DO NOT I will repeat DO NOT buy any other net thinking will be better because probably is more expensive...better think again this net is all you ever will need! Enjoy your summer playing with family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Great Net - Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this is a great net. My dog ran into the tether lines of our old net that we had in the yard for a day and snapped the pole in half. We set this one up without any issue even though we weren't convinced that it would stay up since the poles don't go into the ground (just the tether/stakes are in the ground). Shockingly its been a month+ of hard play, wind and dogs running through the yard and it is standing up without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good set!! I was pleasantly surprised when we set this net up. The poles are sturdy, the net is good quality, the court lines are bright and have steaks attached. My husband and I were able to set the net up in just a few minutes. We play volleyball games in my back yard often and received several compliments when we set this net up!!
customer_reviews.author: Brithney Alex

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set. It is beautiful and very well made. The reason I bought this was to prevent my young grandchildren from pulling on the net and breaking something when the family gets together. It did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This item is excellent! Ordered for my daughters birthday party and was excellent quality! Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for a nephew. It was great! The carrying case is nice, the ball is good quality. We got the net up and secure in about 20 minutes and were playing right away. It was a little hard to get the tension tight enough to keep it from drooping, but overall highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K-Libz

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Fun
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for backyard fun. It's survived southern summer storms, standing perfectly. It's setup is easy, though it does require two people IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Quib

customer_reviews.title: Good Set.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set during quarantine. we love and used it a lot since we’ve been home a lot. The only thing is the V ball popped after couple of times. Not sure if anyone else ran through the same problem. I could not reach out to anyone from the manufacturer company to replace the deflated ball. So we ended up buying a new ball and we use the new ball a lot and still good.
customer_reviews.author: Abeer Awad

customer_reviews.title: Ball leaked / Net Torn
customer_reviews.text: Net arrived torn and the volleyball leaked right out of the box.. my family is disappointed, and it's not worth packing it all in the box and sending it back. Will Just attempt to repair it myself, but hate to after spending that kind of money on what I thought would be a quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Would def recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for our family. It's portable, so we take it to the park. The boundary lines are a nice touch. The stakes and poles are both sturdy, and the net is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kahomada

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball set
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for a family get away weekend. We definitely got our money's worth. Easy to set up and loads of fun for all. The neon yellow made it usable when it was getting dark outside. My family loved the out of bounds markers to keep things fair as the games progressed. I'm so glad we purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for Christmas. It looked like it would be the best deal with the quality of the next, poles and the fact it has ratcheting tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Crawford

customer_reviews.title: No QC?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my son's grad party. Assembled it completely only to discover this major flaw in the bottom center of the net rendering it useless and a ton of disappointment. Will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the cheap ones and good for kids and beach but nothing exciting
customer_reviews.text: Its simple reasonably strong. Much bigger than i expected. Is it going to stand up to a pro spiking it or falling on the net... not a chance. It will bend and snap instantly but as far as back yard kit for kids to play with... yea seems better than most of the cheap sets from the local box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and exactly what we were looking for. Our 10 year old loves volleyball and was so happy to get this for Easter this year. It keeps her busy during the pandemic. Comes with a ball as well. Sturdy even through a wind storm. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawv

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous at first but very happy in the end
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a family reunion. I was nervous about getting a cheap volleyball net setup and have buyers remorse. I was very happy that it is sturdy and will last for a while. What the might need to improve on is the "plastic rope" which seems to come unwound and will eventually have to be fixed or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this volleyball set!! We use it about every weekend! Easy set up, the poles holding the net are super durable, the whole equipment just looks & feels stong. Super happy with purchase!! Shipping was earlier than expected which was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our backyard and parks
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We play a lot of rec league Vball and in the summer we like to play at home more and at the park. Great size. Decent/good net. You will want to purchase a better ball. However this is a great little setup.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana B

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our twins "end of 7th grade" party. Put together by the twins and was the hit of party, even out doing the swimming pool as an attraction. Only 'downside' is the border, it was caught in the users feet and they finally removed it and played without the borderlines.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Very sturdy, easy to fix on ground / backyard
customer_reviews.text: The best quality Very sturdy, easy to fix on ground / backyard It is little lengthy if you are looking for backyard, make sure the length is okay for you! Adjustable rope was little damaged, but I don’t care, not sure if the rope brakes after long time in sun
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Good quality and easy to assembly/unassembly and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It was great but didn't suit my needs
customer_reviews.text: It was great but didn't suit my needs. I bought it to set up in my backyard, but the court is too big and I was unable to get the boundaries set up properly. The item itself was great, however, the net does sag a little bit when setting it up for the first time. What I did was make sure that the poles are pulled tightly and to connect the bottom of the net to the eye hook piece.
customer_reviews.author: The Bao

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking!
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball net is the best one we have had yet! It is very sturdy and well made! It withstands windstorms which we have often! The net and ropes are made of a durable material so it doesn’t sag! Very easy to set up! Looks great in the yard!
customer_reviews.author: CathDE

customer_reviews.title: It’s big
customer_reviews.text: This is full size kit. It really a pop up back yard kit. My daughter takes it to the public park to setup and play. One happy camper. Thank you, looks quality, and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Furlong

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so my daughter could practice with some friends. It was so easy to put up and take down. It is perfect for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Torsky

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a good quality volleyball net set this is the one. Very happy with the quality of this product. We are not super serious volleyball players but we have gatherings to our house where people like to play. I wanted a set that was easy to setup and take down, that was sturdy and not cheap like others I have seen and also had the boundary lines. This was all that and comes in a nice bag to store and carry. Also, the ball that comes with it has a softer feel and is more pleasant to play with. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gasser

customer_reviews.title: top notch value
customer_reviews.text: absolutely great quality set. Price fluctuates a LOT, but I got mine at the low end of the cycle and I feel I got a great deal. Don't waste your time or money with the cheapy sets at the big box/grocery store. Get this and enjoy it a long time
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Broke right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Pump broke first time we used it, right out of the box. Needle broke off and was left inside the ball - making the ball useless as well, until we pried it out with a tweezers. Whether the ball will leak now we don’t know. Net seems okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jill in ATL

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was much better quality than I expected for a portable volleyball set. Good quality net, stakes, and ball. Only possible weak link might be the poles, but so far all is good. I set up by myself, but would be much easier with two. For the money spent, I think this is a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: great volleyball set
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered this volleyball set for an event I was having It looked nice and was inexpensive. When I received the set I was pleasantly surprised with the ease of set up, and the quality of the set. Additional the boundary lines are extremely helpful. I am extremely happy with this set and would highly recommend it. Ipurchased a different set previously that was more expensive, harder to set up, did not look as nice, had no boundary lines and was a complete pain. This set is one of the nicest Ive seen and very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Eman74

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: its been six moths since purchase, net and poles have held up well. close enough to a high school net to do the job. boundary lines faded fast, went from yellow to almost white in about two months. We kept the set up during the spring as we played a lot, then took it down for most of the summer. During storms we took down the net and poles only. great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnston

customer_reviews.title: NET NOT SUITABLE FOR BEACH VOLLEYBALL
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could use this for beach volleyball...Beware - if you are attaching the net to existing poles there are not bottom grommets on the net to tie it to a loop. We've had to come up with some pretty creative and annoying strategies to get this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Received used item
customer_reviews.text: The item I received seemed like a good quality item, however it was used already. It was also missing the ball and pump that are supposed to come with the volleyball net.
customer_reviews.author: WindBlownLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: This set is waaay more well-constructed than I thought it would be for this price point. It comes in very nice bag with all you need for a quality home set-up. It was very easy to set up with two people, likely still easy for one to do (but who plays volleyball all by themself). We might just be the envy of our COVID-19 neighborhood with it set up in the front yard!
customer_reviews.author: Cameran Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Baden Champions Series Volleyball Set
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grand daughter's Christmas, she loves this set,
customer_reviews.author: Flowers Cove

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well in the FL sunn
customer_reviews.text: We've had this set for almost 6 months. My daughter practices with it almost everyday, so it has been set up outside in the FL sun quite a while. The net has held up very well, as has the ball. The out of bounds material just recently started to degrade, but overall I am impressed with this set for the money. The net pulls tight and stays tight. 5 stars for sure... especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Verkaik

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for a company cookout event and was surprised how neat it came packed- ready to go and easy to set up. The bright colors are very visible and overall great quality for game play. I will caution to be careful inflating the ball, I may have over inflated because about an hour of use playing out doors the ball stitching came undone about a half inch and warped the ball slightly. Still happy with the purchase just a caution before play.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Norris

customer_reviews.title: Finally! An awesome volleyball net!
customer_reviews.text: We have had less expensive nets in the past that did not hold up at all. We got this net for right around $100. It is awesome! We have used it numerous times and have not had any issues! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beachmom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Highschool kids assembled it independently. Has been up since Easter and has withstood many severe storms. Very sturdy! Hope to take it to parks soon.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Net Set for the Family
customer_reviews.text: We have used this volleyball set so much during covid. Everything fits perfectly in the bag to transport anywhere! We have set it up on open fields and the beach, and we have it down to an art form with less than 5 min set up. We only had to cut the outside line so it did not get tangled, and we bring a hammer just in case the ground is hard. It has given us hours of volleyball fun!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great quaility
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded our backyard v-ball net and this one is great! We used some spiral spikes we had laying around to make it extra secure, but they ones they provide work great also. Net is good quality. and poles are very sturdy. The boundary lines are already measured and come with spikes in place. Loved that! We used 2 adults for set up and it was so easy. maybe took 10 minutes and the hardest part was opening all the boxes. You could do it with one person also. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Crawford

customer_reviews.title: This set should include a mallet
customer_reviews.text: This was great when we set it up on the beach in San Diego, but getting the poles down into the sand was tricky. I didnt think to bring a mallet/hammer so I had to use my trailer hitch lol
customer_reviews.author: Adam Melot

customer_reviews.title: Great vball set!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this volleyball net! My aunt had one for years that we used and I loved it so much I had to get one of my own. Love this one I purchased also. It sets up fairly easily and is very sturdy. Would recommend this net to everyone who loves to play vball.
customer_reviews.author: Lambert

customer_reviews.title: The hit of the housewarming!
customer_reviews.text: Was definitely the hit of my housewarming! My family and friends had a great time and they were super competitive. The event was about 6 hours and it fell twice, but after some rough spiking, so it was still worth it. Great buy! Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Shadae Hargrave

customer_reviews.title: Decent net,easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Kinda was looking for the bright green netting for viability. Instead received the newer colored blue and white version..still a good set though.
customer_reviews.author: True Wellness TC

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our daughter for Christmas and went to open it up for the first time recently. We discovered that the set is missing the 2 poles that include the eye hooks that make it possible to attach the net and we received 2 extra poles with the feet on the bottom. Very disappointing since we are past the time frame in which we could return it.
customer_reviews.author: rjh0078

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The strips that line where you stand inside to play were sunbleached and broke apart after being set up outside after about 2 months. Net and ball are great though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Outdoor Setup!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 nets for a Company Picnic and I am extremely impressed! They are strong and sturdy with a easy quick setup and take down. They took all the abuse you could expect from a party and players all over the net without any issue at all. The anchors were perfect as well as the boundary lines and did not have to touch the nets and setup the entire day. The ball is very nice and on the softer side for everyone and its comes with a perfect case to fit it all. I would recommend anyone to buy this Volleyball Set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before purchasing this set. Extremely easy set up. Has been used at numerous graduation parties this year. Holds up to a lot of wear and tear from teenage players. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit but consider ground anchors instead of the stakes supplied.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, appears to be high quality and works great, only suggestion would be to upgrade the ground stakes to spiral anchors. The stakes supplied come out to easy with any hard hit on the net.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for the family to play at our Thanksgiving gathering. The quality is very good for the price, and the whole family enjoyed it. We left it up for about two weeks, and it withstood the elements with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: CNF

customer_reviews.title: Good Net But Wrong Pole Setup
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good net especially for the price, but they sent the wrong poles. The poles are 3-piece. We got 4 of one section and 0 of the bottom section, so we weren't able to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Green

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: Baden nets are amazing! They do really well in the on and off Colorado weather and are so easy to set up. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Neff

customer_reviews.title: Ball was torn and dirty
customer_reviews.text: Ball came dirty and torn and so did the inside of the bad. I obviously was sent a used product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Good net, ball just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few days, but very happy with the quality so far. We had been hitting around in the yard some and I didn’t realize how much of a difference having a net has when practicing with young ones. Seems obvious now. They are much more excited about learning now. Very pleased with the quality of this net. Ball is ok, not the best. The boundary lines are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Alexander Poole

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Actually almost bought a slightly cheaper one, but this set is really good quality. Very easy to put up and take down. Even better it fits back into the bag it comes in easily every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball all day long!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set!!! Definitely worth the money. Bought for my daughters graduation party and my kids assembled without any help in about 15 minutes. My friends asked to borrow it and one bought the same one that same day!!!!
customer_reviews.author: roadrunnerkel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love our net!! Its durable, and has been through some storms yet it still stands! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: *edited* review

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend volleyball set!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a graduation party. Went up pretty easy and was very sturdy. I was impressed with the quality. Used my own volleyball though. One it can with was a little smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jr Cooper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great net!
customer_reviews.text: This net is great. We bought it because my daughter can’t practice with other players during the shelter-in-place and it is just me and her. Setting it up is easy and dismantling is easy too. It is surprisingly sturdy as well. Now I am thinking why we didn’t order this earlier. It’s such a great deal at this price and can give countless hours of entertainment for teens. More time away from a screen!!
customer_reviews.author: Smart!

customer_reviews.title: Some durability issues, but great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue we've had is that one of the rings on the boundary line ripped off after two uses. Outside of that, excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mesa Youth Sports

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing net I took probably 30 mins to set up and is very nice also has variable height setting and the volley ball is amazing comes with a pump and all highly recommend buying we have had it for 3 days and there has been not problems
customer_reviews.author: RuthAnn Pollard

customer_reviews.title: great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I like the field liner and the carrying case, very portable and easy to setup and break down. I had fun with my kids with a test play today afer setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Ray T.

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very Impressive volleyball set, It was very simple to set up with 2 people. Very big size to play with 8 people.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Molina

customer_reviews.title: great size and fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy instructions and set up went fast. loved that it included a ball so I stop everything included. easy carry case after play to store everything in.
customer_reviews.author: doddie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We’re very happy with this product. We use it when we get together with groups and everybody has a great time. It is strong, sturdy and even looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P.

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit volleyball net. The post are metal instead of plastic, it is easy to put up and take down. Has an awesome carry case and a pump to pump up the ball. I would highly recommend this net and would give it more stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase so far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy up, easy down (to be able to mow!) Got real windy...30-40mph winds, and it did blow down, but ropes and anchors prevented it from blowing away or getting tangled. Best one so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. Milliser

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good quality and easy to put up. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the price. Teenagers used this & only sloped slightly from their assertive game playing. Set up all Minnesota Summer, worked perfectly. Cleaned & stored away easily with little rusting/discoloration. Take care of this product and it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love that the net attaches directly to the poles. The stakes are easy to push into the ground and pull out due to the gripes. Also really like the boundary lines for help with serving practice! The ball is not the best quality but I purchased this more for the net, so not a big deal to me. Overall really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: UofM

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Two teens had no problem setting it up. So much better than the two cheaper sets I’ve bought in the past!!
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Full size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Full size and good sturdy quality, unlike most sets you find in the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kliff

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this set! The set-up didn't take too long, and we have spent many hours this summer playing family volleyball. We would recommend not leaving it set up outside for more than a few days at a time as we did experience sun damage to the guy wires and the boundary lines, but Baden customer service was so great and helped us out. Play ball!
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This been a pure joy in this season of having to stay at home.
customer_reviews.author: Tj FIelds

customer_reviews.title: Easy but stakes don’t hold
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up but stakes pull out with slight breeze. Round stakes poor choice even at 45 degree angle. Almost impossible to get an even, straight net height.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun with the family. Great set to keep everyone active at the park or in your backyard. Kids always want to compete against us old folks. By the way we always come on top, no mercy.. Lol.... Great quality, this set will last for years to come. You can tell it's really well made from the moment you open the bag. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice volleyball set for portable. Edge marker corner grommets come off too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Nice volleyball set for portable. Edge marker corner grommets come off too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Upton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable ! Very pleased and more than impressed ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this net! Super easy to put up and very sturdy. The boundary lines are great! Easy to move when mowing.
customer_reviews.author: BCVM

customer_reviews.title: Held up blocks into net
customer_reviews.text: Amazing net... We had a volleyball birthday party for my friends 30th. All adults, there were a lot of blocks that ran into the net as well as a lot of serves. This net held up to everything. I trully was amazed. I can't believe it stood up to the beating of our plays. Very easy set up. Love it we are having monthly volleyball games at the park now because it was such a big hit at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Dgomez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic net and ball! Easy to set up and take dow. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca Mandia

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pump
customer_reviews.text: Ours did not come with a pump. I can not see any way to contact seller. Would be great if we could just get a pump sent to us rather than to have to return the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Counter

customer_reviews.title: Tons of family fun with this high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Tons of family fun with this high quality product. Easy set up, stays in place well with regular play/use. Great carry bag for storage over the winter months. Well constructed to last for years if well taken care of. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie L Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great net for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Was super easy to setup, took about 10 minutes with a buddy helping. Net is tight and strong and the out of bounds line is great to have. Used it for both badminton and volley ball, would definitely recommend this set if you are looking for a backyard net.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball 🏐 fun
customer_reviews.text: No fuss assembly. Can take with you to go. No Digging required!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Baden Champions Volleyball Set
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES - (1) Baden Match Point Volleyball, (1) Regulation Size Volleyball Net, (1) Ball pump w/needle, (2) Heavy duty adjustable steel poles, (1) Set of weather-resistant boundary lines, and (1) Durable carry bag

BUILT TOUGH - Durability and stability are key when it comes to backyard volleyball sets. This sets black powder-coated heavy-duty steel poles & stakes ensure that it will stay standing long after your done playing
GRAB AND GO - Everything you need fits into one single durable weather-resistant carry bag for easy storage and transportation
Poles: 1.5 inch steel. EASY SETUP - This frustration-free design ensures an easy setup and take down of the volleyball set in just minutes
GREAT FOR - (2-4) people, yard games, family cookouts, summer camps, and social events ; Stakes 10" metal stakes
